channel.title: Mails on Keanu
channel.description: Recent content in Mails on Keanu

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: I decided to create a site just because why not. I plan to write about my internet life story so far here, mostly about my projects, some drama, and more. The internet is a wild place, trust me. I’m using Hugo with the Nix theme on steroids to achieve absolute perfection. I even stole some CSS from somewhere to animate a cool terminal text effect at the top. I’m not a very “bloggy” person so don’t expect me to churn out tons of content.
